artifacts.description: Worker result for cycle-001-20260301T132846 with local environment evidence and externally oriented next tasks.

becoming: Help a nearby human avoid avoidable daily disruptions through timely local readiness checks and concrete actions.

proposed_tasks.description: At morning and evening, perform a 2-minute outside observation (rain, wind, visibility, surface hazards) and publish 3 concrete actions for the nearby human such as umbrella, route, and footwear choices.
proposed_tasks.notes: Adds direct real-world sensing that on-device telemetry cannot capture.
proposed_tasks.title: Run a twice-daily doorstep conditions scan with action tips

proposed_tasks.description: Sample battery and charging state every 5 minutes and alert before likely departure windows when battery is below threshold or still discharging, with explicit next actions (plug in now, reduce load, carry power bank).
proposed_tasks.notes: Current machine observation shows 32% battery and discharging, creating immediate day-to-day risk.
proposed_tasks.title: Start a pre-departure charging risk alert

proposed_tasks.description: Monitor default route, gateway reachability, and DNS resolution; when degraded, emit a short human-facing fallback checklist (hotspot, alternate venue, reschedule critical calls).
proposed_tasks.notes: Observed interface is active with local IP but Wi-Fi association query reports not associated, so explicit reliability checks are justified.
proposed_tasks.title: Deploy local connectivity outage checks with fallback actions

proposed_tasks.description: Before commute hours, combine doorstep observation, charging risk, and connectivity health into a one-card recommendation with one critical action to take immediately.
proposed_tasks.notes: Turns observed local signals into direct human decision value each day.
proposed_tasks.title: Publish a morning readiness card with GO or DELAY recommendation

summary: Local physical/environment inspection completed using on-device evidence only (no external research). Verification commands and key outputs: `date '+%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S%z %A'; uname -a; sw_vers; uptime` => 2026-03-01T13:29:17+1000 (Sunday), macOS 26.3 (Darwin 25.3.0), uptime 6 days 5:18, load 2.91/2.67/2.79; `pmset -g batt` => "Now drawing from 'Battery Power'" at 32%, discharging, 1:43 remaining; `system_profiler SPPowerDataType` => charger connected: No, charging: No, battery condition: Normal, cycle count: 379, maximum capacity: 89%; `networksetup -getairportnetwork en0` + `ifconfig en0` => not associated with AirPort while interface is active with IPv4 192.168.1.234 and IPv6 addresses; `df -h /` => 62Gi available on root volume; `cat devices/66f110fc-de9e-4d7e-9e4b-5b6da61f4c76/state.json` + `sed -n '1,240p' devices/66f110fc-de9e-4d7e-9e4b-5b6da61f4c76/events.ndjson` => day 0 baseline with no tasks/hardware requests/incidents and only initialization + cycle-start events. Contract verification: `PYTHONPATH=src python3 -c "from pathlib import Path; from wdib.contracts import load_json, validate_payload; p=Path('devices/66f110fc-de9e-4d7e-9e4b-5b6da61f4c76/runtime/worker_results/cycle-001-20260301T132846.json'); payload=load_json(p); validate_payload(payload, 'worker_result.schema.json', label='worker_result'); print('worker_result_schema_valid')"` => worker_result_schema_valid.
